name: EVERTOWER
description:
Welcome to Evertower!

QUICK JAM PERIOD DISCLAIMER.

when you enter a score, make sure you remember to press enter to submit your score.

i have notices that this is a problem after the deadline.

i will fix this in a later update post-jam.

A game created during the span of the ScoreSpace jam by us at lilcage!

Use your grappling hook to reach further than you can jump!

Or shoot your way through the tower with your gun.

Embark onto an endless journey in an endlessly tiled tower full of enemies and riches.

 

entirely customizable color palette!

Post jam updates planned:

  • More tiles
  • Level mode with stars and the classic crap
  • Speed-run mode
  • More enemy types
  • More shape variation and tile "classes"
  • More types of weaponry
  • Different types of hooks (maybe?)
